mapper.select: SELECT task_id, task_name, creator_id, executor_id, start_location, distance, deadline_time, completion_time, upload_time, status, create_time FROM task WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET task_name = #{taskName}, creator_id = #{creatorId}, executor_id = #{executorId}, start_location = #{startLocation}, distance = #{distance}, deadline_time = #{deadlineTime}, completion_time = #{completionTime}, upload_time = #{uploadTime}, status = #{status} WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
